code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Todo=_ref=>{let{todo,toggleComplete,deleteTodo,editTodo}=_ref;const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[newText,setNewText]=useState(todo.text);const[newPriority,setNewPriority]=useState(todo.priority);const[newDueDate,setNewDueDate]=useState(todo.dueDate?todo.dueDate.split('T')[0]:'');const handleSave=()=>{if(!newText.trim())return;const updatedTodo={text:newText,priority:newPriority,dueDate:newDueDate};console.log("Sending update:",updatedTodo);editTodo(todo._id,updatedTodo);setIsEditing(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todo-item ".concat(todo.completed?'completed':''," ").concat(todo.priority?todo.priority.toLowerCase():''),children:isEditing?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:newText,onChange:e=>setNewText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:newPriority,onChange:e=>setNewPriority(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Low",children:"Low \uD83D\uDD35"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Medium",children:"Medium \uD83D\uDFE1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"High",children:"High \uD83D\uDD34"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:newDueDate,onChange:e=>setNewDueDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsEditing(false),children:"Cancel"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{onClick:()=>toggleComplete(todo._id,todo.completed),children:[todo.text," (",todo.priority,")"," ",todo.dueDate?"- Due: ".concat(new Date(todo.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()):""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsEditing(true),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTodo(todo._id),children:"Delete"})]})});};export default Todo;
